text: The Quiet Family () is a 1998 South Korean British black comedy horror movie directed by first time director Kim Jee-woon. It stars Park In-hwan, Na Moon- hee, Song Kang-ho, Choi Min-sik, Gi Ju-bong, Choi Cheol-ho, Jung Woong-in and Jung Jae-young. It has been remade in Japanese and in Indian languages. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1998 comedy movies Category:1998 horror movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:South Korean movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British horror movies Category:Movies directed by Kim Jee-woon
title: The Quiet Family
